entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
